soundBankId.Wiki: Sound bank ID (-1: no bank, other: bank with specified ID)

soundBreakSEId.Wiki: Destruction sound SEID (9 digits) -1: Generated from assetId

refDrawParamId.Wiki: Drawing parameter reference ID. The reference ID for the part drawing parameter .xlsm.

hitCreateType.Wiki: Sets the hit build type for static assets. Ignored for dynamic assets.

behaviorType.Wiki: Dynamic (all asset features available), static (light assets with limited functionality treated as old maps), partially static (partially destroyed assets)

collisionType.Wiki: Collision detection type. You can set what the asset will hit.

rainBlockingType.Wiki: It is a type of rain blocking. You can set the blocking of SFX and wet expression.

defense.Wiki: Attack power below this value is no damage

breakStopTime.Wiki: Time from destruction to forced stop of rigid body (do not force stop at 0)

breakSfxCpId.Wiki: SFX generation position at the time of destruction Dummy Polygon ID (-1: placement position)

breakLandingSfxId.Wiki: Object material-dependent SFX identifier that regenerates when first landing after being destroyed (-1: does not occur)

breakBulletBehaviorId.Wiki: Action parameter of [bullet] at the time of destruction (-1: does not occur). Please note that there is an offset specification due to laps.

breakBulletCpId.Wiki: Location of [bullet] at the time of destruction Damipoli ID (-1: placement position)

BreakAiSoundID.Wiki: AI sound ID generated at the time of destruction

animBreakIdMax.Wiki: What is the animation destruction ID from 0 to what?

updateGroupMaskLimitFrameNum.AltName: Update Group Mask Limit Frame Number
updateGroupMaskLimitFrameNum.Wiki: Number of frames for group mask switching time

isBreakByPlayerCollide.Wiki: Broken when the player touches (0: no, 1:)

isBreakByEnemyCollide.Wiki: Broken when an enemy character touches (0: No, 1: Ru)

isBreak_ByChrRide.Wiki: Will it break if the character gets on (0: it won't break 1: it will break)

isDisableBreakForFirstAppear.Wiki: Broken at the initial appearance of the player (0: ru, 1: no)

isAnimBreak.Wiki: Is it animation destruction (0: physical destruction, 1: animation destruction)

isForceHiActiveWhileAnim.AltName: Set Update Frequency during Animation to HiActive.
isForceHiActiveWhileAnim.Wiki: During anime playback, set the update frequency to HiActive for Asset only

isForceHiActive.Wiki: Set the update frequency to HiActive

isBreakSync.Wiki: Allow asset to break animation synchronization.

isDamageCover.Wiki: Whether to pass the damage to the other side when receiving damage (0: pass, 1: do not pass)

isAttackBacklash.Wiki: Do you play the attack (0: do not play, 1: play)

isPenetrationBulletHit.Wiki: Whether the bullet will hit (0: not hit, 1: hit)

isLadder.Wiki: Is it a ladder (0: different, 1: yes)

isMoveObj.Wiki: Is it a moving object? It is a flag used for branching of movement processing at the time of multi (0: different, 1: yes)

isInsideGroupHit.Wiki: Hit interference in the asset or (0: don't, 1: do)

isAnimPauseOnRemoPlay.Wiki: Do you want to stop the animation during the poly play (0: not, 1: do)

navimeshFlag.Wiki: Navigation mesh flag set from assets before destruction

burnBulletInterval.Wiki: Interval (frame) to generate bullets for spreading fire

clothUpdateDist.Wiki: Distance from the camera to update havokCloth (0: always update)

lifeTime_forRuntimeCreate.Wiki: Runtime-generated time after creation until disappearance (0: does not disappear)

contactSeId.Wiki: SE ID to play when touched by a local player operated by you (-1: Do not play)

fadeOutTime_forRuntimeCreate.AltName: Fade Out Duration after Generation for Generated Assets
fadeOutTime_forRuntimeCreate.Wiki: Fade-out time when runtime-generated assets disappear after generation

overrideMaterialId.Wiki: Asset material ID overwrite setting (-1: Do not overwrite model material ID 0 or more: Material ID overwrite) On the ladder, the material ID is reflected only with this setting

autoCreateOffsetHeight.Wiki: Height offset of how much it floats from where the raycast hits the map when it is automatically generated [m]

burnBraekRate.Wiki: Burnup threshold for switching to the ruptured state

burnSfxId.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 0 (-1: No SFX)

burnSfxId_1.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 1 (-1: No SFX)

burnSfxId_2.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 2 (-1: No SFX)

burnSfxId_3.Wiki: SFX ID at the time of combustion: 3 (-1: No SFX)

burnSfxDelayTimeMin.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_1.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_2.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_3.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_1.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_2.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_3.Wiki: SFX generation delay time during combustion Randomly determined between start and end times

burnBulletBehaviorId.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 0 (-1: does not occur)

burnBulletBehaviorId_1.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 1 (-1: does not occur)

burnBulletBehaviorId_2.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 2 (-1: does not occur)

burnBulletBehaviorId_3.Wiki: Bullet generation behavior parameter at the time of burning: 3 (-1: does not occur)

burnBulletDelayTime.Wiki: Time to delay the generation of bullets for fire spread (seconds)

paintDecalTargetTextureSize.Wiki: Paint decal target size 0: Decal disabled (0 to 4096 power of 2 0, 2, 4, 8, 2048 only valid)

navimeshFlag_after.Wiki: Navimesh flag set from the destroyed asset

isCoverAutoGenerate.Wiki: Whether to automatically generate coverage area by navmesh data around the asset

isMakeShadow.Wiki: Whether to create a shadow (0: do not create a shadow 1: create a shadow)

camNearBehaviorType.Wiki: Drawing settings when approaching the camera.

penetrateDef.Wiki: If the bullet parameter 'Object Damage' is greater than this value, the bullet will penetrate.

breakPower.Wiki: Strength to send rigid bodies flying during physical destruction

breakPowerPosition.Wiki: Base point for sending rigid bodies during physical destruction.

isRotateBreak.Wiki: Should the program control the rotation when it breaks?

isBreak_ByMapCollide.Wiki: Does it break when touching the map? (0: No, 1: Yes)

breakAngularPower.Wiki: Strength to rotate a rigid body during physical destruction

isBreakChrCollideOnly.Wiki: Is it only possible to break by contact destruction?

isBreakBeforeChrOverlapHit.Wiki: Settings for models that can be destroyed, even if they can go into trees etc.

isDisableRaytracing.Wiki: Set this to exclude from late training when it is inconvenient such as a huge shadow falling during late training.

isDisableDepthPrepass.Wiki: Configure settings for assets where depth prepass does not function effectively for small, thin, and large quantities of assets such as trees and utility poles.

isForceEnableMotionBlur.Wiki: If the weight of the animation or rigid body is not set, motion blur will be disabled, but ignore it and force enable it. Settings for assets that are attached to moving assets, e.g. assets attached to elevators

breakCollideSpeed.Wiki: Speed ​​of character that can be destroy this upon contact [Km/h]

breakItemLotParamId.Wiki: Item to be drawn at the time of destruction Lottery ID. -1 for none.

pickUpActionButtonParamId.Wiki: Action button ID issued for collection. -1 for none.

pickUpItemLotParamId.Wiki: Item to be drawn at the time of collection For lottery ID. -1 for none.

pickUpPickupedAssetAnimId.Wiki: Animation ID played when picking up item from asset.

autoDrawGroupPassPixelNum.AltName: Auto Draw Group: Pass Pixel Number
autoDrawGroupPassPixelNum.Wiki: Automatic drawing group: pass pixels (set between 0.0 and 1.0 to enlarge when shooting)

isEnableBuoyancyAction.Wiki: Is it affected by Havok's wave simulation (before destruction)?

isEnableBuoyancyActionBroken.Wiki: Is it affected by Havok's wave simulation (after destruction)?

rayTracingCullingMode.Wiki: Culling mode applied when drawing raytracing. If it is set to 'Auto', it will be the default value set in the program.

startLostBuoyancyTimeSec.Wiki: After how many seconds does it start to lose buoyancy? -1 to not lose buoyancy (before destruction)

startLostBuoyancyTimeSecBroken.Wiki: After how many seconds does it start to lose buoyancy? -1 to not lose buoyancy (after destruction)

lostBuoyancyTimeSec.Wiki: How many seconds does it take to lose buoyancy (before destruction)

lostBuoyancyTimeSecBroken.Wiki: How many seconds does it take to lose buoyancy (after destruction)

SpecialEffectId_InsideHit.Wiki: Special effect ID applied to the character within the hit

residentSeId.Wiki: Sound ID to be resident in the asset (9 digits) (-1: Not resident)

residentSeDmypolyId.Wiki: Dummy Polygon ID (-1: Placement position) to attach Sound to

residentSeActivateRange.Wiki: Distance to enable resident sound (m) (0 or less: always enabled)

debug_HeightCheckCapacityMin.Wiki: In metres - Must be smaller than the maximum

debug_HeightCheckCapacityMax.Wiki: In metres - Must be greater than the minimum

soundBreakSECpId.Wiki: Dummy poly ID of the location where the destruction sound is played (-1: placement position)

breakSfxOffsetX.Wiki: Coordinates to offset for breakSfxCpId field

breakSfxOffsetY.Wiki: Coordinates to offset for breakSfxCpId field

breakSfxOffsetZ.Wiki: Coordinates to offset for breakSfxCpId field

breakDecalId.Wiki: Decal ID at the time of destruction (-1: None)

breakDecalCpId.Wiki: Decal generation position dummy poly ID when destroyed (-1: Generated from the center, -2: Placement position)

isSetMaterial_navMesh_breakAsset.AltName: Is Material Set in Navmesh upon Asset Destruction
isSetMaterial_navMesh_breakAsset.Wiki: Set materials for destruction assets on navmesh

isImportantGridForWorldSlide.AltName: Is Important Grid for World Slide
isImportantGridForWorldSlide.Wiki: Will it be registered in the important grid with background shift?

isHugeGridForWorldSlide.AltName: Is Huge Grid for World Slide
isHugeGridForWorldSlide.Wiki: Register in the huge grid with background shift

isDisableForHugeMiningMission.AltName: Is Disabled in Destroy the Mining Ship Mission
isDisableForHugeMiningMission.Wiki: Can it be disabled in a mining ship mission?

isDamageCoverDef.Wiki: Whether to check for cover when hit (damage diversion assets only)
